text: @GovRicketts You A-hole!  Refusing to put out your HORRIFIC covid-19 numbers??!  You are just like Trump!  What does that mean?  It means you are SACRIFICING PEOPLE'S LIVES to save your economy.  Hmmm, sounds like someone else we know??? You should be tried for crimes against humanity!!
